before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"bclic","text":"Note: The amount of RNA required for detection depends on the abundance of the RNA of interest. In general, we recommend, using \u003e 10 copies of the (SARS-CoV-2) viral genome as input. In addition, we recommend setting up a no template control reaction and all reactions are set-up in a hood.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":5},{"style":"bold","offset":255,"length":34}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6jneh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"d00l5","text":"Note: : If sample Ct is between 12-15, then it is recommended per the nCoV 2019 sequencing protocol v3 LoCost to dilute the sample 100-fold in water, if between 15-18 then dilute 10-fold in water. This will reduce the likelihood of PCR inhibition.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":5},{"style":"bold","offset":70,"length":39}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":70,"length":39}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"E9CAF3989EE011EB8F410A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://nam10.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.protocols.io%2Fview%2Fncov-2019-sequencing-protocol-v3-locost-bh42j8ye\u0026data=04%7C01%7Cgautreau%40neb.com%7C4515bf35c1df4e09738408d8f9d0d347%7C77cefbc6b3d64d6a9f740664881c384b%7C0%7C0%7C637534022580857579%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000\u0026sdata=IZCA2DJg5iQQmjchjv2h2sb6%2F2M34f2s52kISC4cOzs%3D\u0026reserved=0"}}}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"d3ml","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a319s","text":"This protocol is adapted for animal samples and is based on the methods for the NEBNext® ARTIC SARS-CoV-2 Companion Kit (Oxford Nanopore Technologies®), NEB #E7660S/L 24/96 reactions.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"67ldv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9prlc","text":"This protocol does not include a cleanup and normalization step for each sample after cDNA synthesis. Performing the cleanup and normalization step creates library pools where the reads for each library are more evenly distributed. Skipping these steps reduces hands on time but may require a longer sequencing run to obtain sufficient coverage for each sample. To obtain more even sample to sample coverage, we recommend normalizing the RNA samples prior to starting the protocol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8jlqc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3md27","text":"Changes in this version:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1uehi","text":"Removal of the human primers","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dc2c3","text":"Combining multiple barcoding reactions (step 15 and 21)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cueso","text":"Addition of Loading Flongle Flow Cell section ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9p1fd","text":"Addition of Analysis section","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

fork_info.title: NEBNext® ARTIC SARS-CoV-2 Companion Kit (Oxford Nanopore Technologies®) E7660 -- Express Protocol without PCR Bead Cleanup

guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"b3618","text":"Overview ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"a5lll","text":"The NEBNext ARTIC SARS-CoV-2 Companion Library Prep Kit (Oxford Nanopore Technologies) contains the enzymes, buffers, beads and oligos required to convert a broad range of total RNA input amounts into targeted, high quality libraries for next-generation sequencing on the Oxford Nanopore platform. Primers targeting the human EDF1 and NEDD8 genes are supplied as optional internal controls. The fast, user-friendly workflow also has minimal hands-on time. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"43ejn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"duvef","text":"Each kit component must pass rigorous quality control standards, and for each new lot the entire set of reagents is functionally validated together by construction and sequencing of an indexed library on the Oxford Nanopore sequencing platform. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2j265","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"d2cvp","text":"For larger volume requirements, customized and bulk packaging is available by purchasing through the OEM/Bulks department at NEB.
